dcterms:description: The COCO dataset is used for object detection tasks, particularly in the context of deformable convolution networks, which have shown state-of-the-art accuracy in various implementations.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is utilized for semantic segmentation tasks, providing urban scene understanding with a focus on high-quality pixel-level annotations.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
